class.name: KalturaFilterPager
class.description: The KalturaFilterPager object enables paging management to be applied upon service list actions

property.name: pageSize
property.description: The number of objects to retrieve. Possible range 1 ≤ value ≤ 50. If omitted or value < 1 - will be set to 25. If a value > 50 provided – will be set to 50

property.name: pageIndex
property.description: The page number for which {pageSize} of objects should be retrieved

property.name: linearChannelId
property.description: The identifier of the linear media representing the channel

property.name: isDefault
property.description: Indicates whether this is the default region for the partner

class.name: KalturaUserAssetRule
class.description: User asset rule - representing different type of rules on an asset(Parental, Geo, User Type, Device)

property.name: ruleType
property.description: Rule type - possible values: Rule type – Parental, Geo, UserType, Device

property.name: description
property.description: Additional description for the specific rule

class.name: KalturaValue
class.description: A representation to return an array of values

class.name: KalturaLongValue
class.description: A string representation to return an array of longs

class.name: KalturaDoubleValue
class.description: A string representation to return an array of doubles

class.name: KalturaBooleanValue
class.description: A string representation to return an array of booleans

class.name: KalturaIntegerValue
class.description: A string representation to return an array of ints

class.name: KalturaStringValue
class.description: A string representation to return an array of strings

property.name: type
property.description: The type of the asset. Possible values: media, recording, epg

property.name: isHouseholdMaster
property.description: Is the user the household master

property.name: position
property.description: The position of the user in the specific asset (in seconds)

property.name: positionOwner
property.description: Indicates who is the owner of this position

property.name: finishedWatching
property.description: Specifies whether the user's current position exceeded 95% of the duration

class.name: KalturaBookmarkListResponse
class.description: List of assets and their bookmarks

property.name: isDefault
property.description: Determined whether image was taken from default configuration or not

property.name: type
property.description: Device types as defined in the system

property.name: url
property.description: URL of the media file to be played

property.name: externalId
property.description: External identifier for the media file

property.name: likes
property.description: Total number of likes for this asset

property.name: views
property.description: Total number of views for this asset

property.name: ratingCount
property.description: Number of people that rated the asset

property.name: type
property.description: Identifies the asset type (EPG, Movie, TV Series, etc). Possible values: 0 – EPG linear programs, or any asset type ID according to the asset types IDs defined in the system.

property.name: images
property.description: Collection of images details that can be used to represent this asset

property.name: metas
property.description: Dynamic collection of key-value pairs according to the String Meta defined in the system

property.name: tags
property.description: Dynamic collection of key-value pairs according to the Tag Types defined in the system

property.name: startDate
property.description: Date and time represented as epoch. For VOD – since when the asset is available in the catalog. For EPG/Linear – when the program is aired (can be in the future).

property.name: endDate
property.description: Date and time represented as epoch. For VOD – till when the asset be available in the catalog. For EPG/Linear – program end time and date

property.name: systemStartDate
property.description: Date and time represented as epoch.

property.name: systemFinalDate
property.description: Date and time represented as epoch.

property.name: enableRecordingPlaybackNonEntitledChannel
property.description: Enable Recording playback for non entitled channel

property.name: enableRecordingPlaybackNonExistingChannel
property.description: Enable Recording playback for non existing channel

property.name: id
property.description: Kaltura unique ID representing the series recording identifier

property.name: createDate
property.description: Specifies when was the series recording created. Date and time represented as epoch.

property.name: updateDate
property.description: Specifies when was the series recording last updated. Date and time represented as epoch.

property.name: excludedSeasons
property.description: List of the season numbers to exclude.

property.name: dynamicLinksSupport
property.description: Indicates whether the C-DVR adapter supports dynamic URLs

property.name: alias
property.description: Alias for the task used to solicit an export using API

property.name: dataType
property.description: The data type exported in this task

property.name: filter
property.description: Filter to apply on the export, utilize KSQL. Note: KSQL currently applies to media assets only. It cannot be used for USERS filtering

property.name: exportType
property.description: Type of export batch – full or incremental

property.name: frequency
property.description: How often the export should occur, reasonable minimum threshold should apply, configurable in minutes

property.name: notificationUrl
property.description: The URL for sending a notification when the task's export process is done

property.name: vodTypes
property.description: List of media type identifiers (as configured in TVM) to export. used only in case data_type = vod

property.name: isActive
property.description: Indicates if the task is active or not

property.name: allowMultiInstance

property.name: assetTypes
property.description: Asset types in the channel. -26 is EPG

property.name: descriptions
property.description: A list of the descriptions for this price on different languages (language code and translation)

property.name: startDate
property.description: The first date the discount is available

property.name: endDate
property.description: The last date the discount is available

property.name: descriptions
property.description: A list of the descriptions of the coupon group on different languages (language code and translation)

property.name: startDate
property.description: The first date the coupons in this coupons group are valid

property.name: endDate
property.description: The last date the coupons in this coupons group are valid

property.name: maxUsesNumber
property.description: Maximum number of uses for each coupon in the group

property.name: maxUsesNumberOnRenewableSub
property.description: Maximum number of uses for each coupon in the group on a renewable subscription

property.name: maxViewsNumber
property.description: The maximum number of times an item in this usage module can be viewed

property.name: viewLifeCycle
property.description: The amount time an item is available for viewing since a user started watching the item

property.name: fullLifeCycle
property.description: The amount time an item is available for viewing

property.name: couponId
property.description: Identifies a specific coupon linked to this object

property.name: waiverPeriod
property.description: Time period during which the end user can waive his rights to cancel a purchase. When the time period is passed, the purchase can no longer be cancelled

property.name: isWaiverEnabled
property.description: Indicates whether or not the end user has the right to waive his rights to cancel a purchase

property.name: isOfflinePlayback
property.description: Indicates that usage is targeted for offline playback

property.name: isRenewable
property.description: Denotes whether or not this object can be renewed

property.name: renewalsNumber
property.description: Defines the number of times the module will be renewed (for the life_cycle period)

property.name: priceId
property.description: Unique identifier associated with this object's price

property.name: discountId
property.description: The discount module identifier of the price plan

property.name: lifeCycle
property.description: Preview module life cycle - for how long the preview module is active

property.name: nonRenewablePeriod
property.description: The time you can't buy the item to which the preview module is assigned to again

property.name: channels
property.description: A list of channels associated with this subscription

property.name: startDate
property.description: The first date the subscription is available for purchasing

property.name: endDate
property.description: The last date the subscription is available for purchasing

property.name: fileTypes
property.description: A list of file types identifiers that are supported in this subscription

property.name: isRenewable
property.description: Denotes whether or not this subscription can be renewed

property.name: renewalsNumber
property.description: Defines the number of times this subscription will be renewed

property.name: isInfiniteRenewal
property.description: Indicates whether the subscription will renew forever

property.name: discountModule
property.description: The internal discount module for the subscription

property.name: names
property.description: A list of the name of the subscription on different languages (language code and translation)

property.name: descriptions
property.description: A list of the descriptions of the subscriptions on different languages (language code and translation)

property.name: mediaId
property.description: Identifier of the media associated with the subscription

property.name: prorityInOrder
property.description: Subscription order (when returned in methods that retrieve subscriptions)

property.name: householdLimitationsId
property.description: The household limitation module identifier associated with this subscription

property.name: gracePeriodMinutes
property.description: The subscription grace period in minutes

property.name: premiumServices
property.description: List of premium services included in the subscription

property.name: maxViewsNumber
property.description: The maximum number of times an item in this usage module can be viewed

property.name: viewLifeCycle
property.description: The amount time an item is available for viewing since a user started watching the item

property.name: waiverPeriod
property.description: Time period during which the end user can waive his rights to cancel a purchase. When the time period is passed, the purchase can no longer be cancelled

property.name: isWaiverEnabled
property.description: Indicates whether or not the end user has the right to waive his rights to cancel a purchase

property.name: userTypes
property.description: List of permitted user types for the subscription

property.name: endDate
property.description: The end date of the entitlement

property.name: lastViewDate
property.description: The last date the item was viewed

property.name: purchaseId
property.description: Purchase identifier (for subscriptions and collections only)

property.name: deviceUdid
property.description: The UDID of the device from which the purchase was made

property.name: deviceName
property.description: The name of the device from which the purchase was made

property.name: isCancelationWindowEnabled
property.description: Indicates whether a cancelation window period is enabled

property.name: maxUses
property.description: The maximum number of uses available for this item (only for subscription and PPV)

property.name: nextRenewalDate
property.description: The date of the next renewal (only for subscription)

property.name: isRenewableForPurchase
property.description: Indicates whether the subscription is renewable in this purchase (only for subscription)

property.name: isRenewable
property.description: Indicates whether a subscription is renewable (only for subscription)

property.name: isInGracePeriod
property.description: Indicates whether the user is currently in his grace period entitlement

property.name: createDate
property.description: Specifies when was the favorite created. Date and time represented as epoch.

property.name: position
property.description: Position in seconds of the relevant asset

property.name: duration
property.description: Duration in seconds of the relevant asset

property.name: watchedDate
property.description: The date when the media was last watched

property.name: finishedWatching
property.description: Boolean which specifies whether the user finished watching the movie or not

property.name: id
property.description: The id of the application token

property.name: expiry
property.description: Expiry time of current token (unix timestamp in seconds)

property.name: sessionDuration
property.description: Expiry duration of KS (Kaltura Session) that created using the current token (in seconds)

property.name: hashType
property.description: The hash type of the token

property.name: sessionPrivileges
property.description: Comma separated privileges to be applied on KS (Kaltura Session) that created using the current token

property.name: sessionType
property.description: Type of KS (Kaltura Session) that created using the current token

property.name: sessionUserId
property.description: User id of KS (Kaltura Session) that created using the current token

class.name: KalturaCatalogWithHolder
class.description: Holder object for Catalog With enum

property.name: typeIn
property.description: Comma separated list of asset types to search within. Possible values: 0 – EPG linear programs entries, any media type ID (according to media type IDs defined dynamically in the system). If omitted – all types should be included.

property.name: bundleTypeEqual
property.description: bundleType - possible values: Subscription or Collection

property.name: kSql
property.description: Search assets using dynamic criteria. Provided collection of nested expressions with key, comparison operators, value, and logical conjunction. Possible keys: any Tag or Meta defined in the system and the following reserved keys: start_date, end_date. epg_id, media_id - for specific asset IDs. geo_block - only valid value is "true": When enabled, only assets that are not restriced to the user by geo-block rules will return. parental_rules - only valid value is "true": When enabled, only assets that the user doesn't need to provide PIN code will return. epg_channel_id – the channel identifier of the EPG program. entitled_assets - valid values: "free", "entitled", "both". free - gets only free to watch assets. entitled - only those that the user is implicitly entitled to watch. Comparison operators: for numerical fields =, >, >=, <, <=, : (in). For alpha-numerical fields =, != (not), ~ (like), !~, ^ (starts with). Logical conjunction: and, or. Search values are limited to 20 characters each. (maximum length of entire filter is 1024 characters)

property.name: idEqual
property.description: the ID of the asset for which to return related assets

property.name: typeIn
property.description: Comma separated list of asset types to search within. Possible values: 0 – EPG linear programs entries, any media type ID (according to media type IDs defined dynamically in the system). If omitted – all types should be included.

property.name: idEqual
property.description: the External ID of the asset for which to return related assets

property.name: typeIn
property.description: Comma separated list of asset types to search within. Possible values: 0 – EPG linear programs entries, any media type ID (according to media type IDs defined dynamically in the system). If omitted – all types should be included.

property.name: kSql
property.description: Search assets using dynamic criteria. Provided collection of nested expressions with key, comparison operators, value, and logical conjunction. Possible keys: any Tag or Meta defined in the system and the following reserved keys: start_date, end_date. epg_id, media_id - for specific asset IDs. geo_block - only valid value is "true": When enabled, only assets that are not restriced to the user by geo-block rules will return. parental_rules - only valid value is "true": When enabled, only assets that the user doesn't need to provide PIN code will return. epg_channel_id – the channel identifier of the EPG program. entitled_assets - valid values: "free", "entitled", "both". free - gets only free to watch assets. entitled - only those that the user is implicitly entitled to watch. Comparison operators: for numerical fields =, >, >=, <, <=, : (in). For alpha-numerical fields =, != (not), ~ (like), !~, ^ (starts with). Logical conjunction: and, or. Search values are limited to 20 characters each. (maximum length of entire filter is 1024 characters)

property.name: typeIn
property.description: Comma separated list of asset types to search within. Possible values: 0 – EPG linear programs entries, any media type ID (according to media type IDs defined dynamically in the system). If omitted – all types should be included.

property.name: idIn
property.description: Comma separated list of EPG channel ids to search within.

property.name: typeIn
property.description: Comma separated list of asset types to search within. Possible values: 0 – EPG linear programs entries, any media type ID (according to media type IDs defined dynamically in the system). If omitted – all types should be included.

property.name: assetIdIn
property.description: Comma separated list of asset identifiers.

property.name: startDateGreaterThanOrEqual
property.description: The beginning of the time window to get the statistics for (in epoch).

property.name: endDateGreaterThanOrEqual
property.description: /// The end of the time window to get the statistics for (in epoch).

property.name: externalIdIn
property.description: List of comma separated regions external identifiers

property.name: isLowest
property.description: A flag that indicates if only the lowest price of an item should return

property.name: totalQuota
property.description: Total quota that is allocated to the household

property.name: availableQuota
property.description: Available quota that household has remaining

property.name: typeIn
property.description: List of inbox message types to search within.

property.name: dateFormat
property.description: Default date format for the date & time entries used in the template

property.name: sound
property.description: Sound file name to play upon message arrival to the device (if supported by target device)

property.name: url
property.description: URL template for deep linking. Example - /app/location/{mediaId}

property.name: fileTypes
property.description: A list of file types identifiers that are supported in this ppv

property.name: discountModules
property.description: The internal discount module for the ppv

property.name: descriptions
property.description: A list of the descriptions of the ppv on different languages (language code and translation)

property.name: isSubscriptionOnly
property.description: Indicates whether or not this ppv can be purchased standalone or only as part of a subscription

property.name: firstDeviceLimitation
property.description: Indicates whether or not this ppv can be consumed only on the first device

property.name: altUrl
property.description: An alternate URL to use in case the main fails

property.name: contentId
property.description: Identifier of the content to get the link for (file identifier)

property.name: baseUrl
property.description: Base URL for the licensed URLs

property.name: streamType
property.description: The stream type to get the URL for

property.name: startDate
property.description: The start date of the stream (epoch)

property.name: fileType
property.description: The file type for the URL

property.name: pushNotificationEnabled
property.description: Push notification capability is enabled for the account

property.name: pushSystemAnnouncementsEnabled
property.description: System announcement capability is enabled for the account

property.name: pushStartHour
property.description: Window start time (UTC) for send automated push messages

property.name: pushEndHour
property.description: Window end time (UTC) for send automated push messages

property.name: pushNotificationEnabled
property.description: Specify if the user want to receive push notifications or not

property.name: pushFollowEnabled
property.description: Specify if the user will be notified for followed content via push. (requires push_notification_enabled to be enabled)

property.name: paymentGatewayIdEqual
property.description: Payment gateway identifier to list the payment methods for

property.name: recordingScheduleWindow
property.description: Recording schedule window. Indicates how long (in minutes) after the program starts it is allowed to schedule the recording

property.name: paddingBeforeProgramStarts
property.description: Indicates how long (in seconds) before the program starts the recording will begin

property.name: paddingAfterProgramEnds
property.description: Indicates how long (in seconds) after the program ends the recording will end

property.name: protectionPeriod
property.description: Specify the time in days that a recording should be protected. Start time begins at protection request.

property.name: protectionQuotaPercentage
property.description: Indicates how many percent of the quota can be used for protection

property.name: recordingLifetimePeriod
property.description: Specify the time in days that a recording should be kept for user. Start time begins with the program end date.

property.name: cleanupNoticePeroid
property.description: The time in days before the recording lifetime is due from which the client should be able to warn user about deletion.

property.name: nonEntitledChannelPlaybackEnabled
property.description: Is recording playback for non-entitled channel enables

property.name: nonExistingChannelPlaybackEnabled
property.description: Is recording playback for non-existing channel enables

property.description: Which type of recently watched media to include in the result – those that finished watching, those that are in progress or both. If omitted or specified filter = all – return all types. Allowed values: progress – return medias that are in-progress, done – return medias that finished watching.

property.name: status
property.description: User model status Possible values: UNKNOWN, OK, ERROR, NOACTION, NOTEXIST, CONFLICT, MERGE, MERGEOK, NEWUSER, MINFRIENDS, INVITEOK, INVITEERROR, ACCESSDENIED, WRONGPASSWORDORUSERNAME, UNMERGEOK

property.name: status
property.description: User model status Possible values: UNKNOWN, OK, ERROR, NOACTION, NOTEXIST, CONFLICT, MERGE, MERGEOK, NEWUSER, MINFRIENDS, INVITEOK, INVITEERROR, ACCESSDENIED, WRONGPASSWORDORUSERNAME, UNMERGEOK

class.name: KalturaSocialConfig
class.description: Returns social configuration for the partner

property.name: productId
property.description: Identifier for the package from which this content is offered

property.name: contentId
property.description: Identifier for the content to purchase. Relevant only if Product type = PPV

property.name: productType
property.description: Package type. Possible values: PPV, Subscription, Collection

property.name: currency
property.description: Identifier for paying currency, according to ISO 4217

property.name: price
property.description: Net sum to charge – as a one-time transaction. Price must match the previously provided price for the specified content.

property.name: paymentMethodId
property.description: Identifier for a pre-entered payment method. If not provided – the household’s default payment method is used

property.name: paymentGatewayId
property.description: Identifier for a pre-associated payment gateway. If not provided – the account’s default payment gateway is used

property.name: previewModuleId
property.description: Preview module identifier (relevant only for subscription)

property.name: receiptId
property.description: A unique identifier that was provided by the In-App billing service to validate the purchase

property.name: paymentGatewayName
property.description: The payment gateway name for the In-App billing service to be used. Possible values: Google/Apple

property.name: id
property.description: Kaltura unique ID representing the transaction

property.name: paymentGatewayReferenceId
property.description: Transaction reference ID received from the payment gateway. Value is available only if the payment gateway provides this information.

property.name: paymentGatewayResponseId
property.description: Response ID received from by the payment gateway. Value is available only if the payment gateway provides this information.

property.name: failReasonCode
property.description: Adapter failure reason code Insufficient funds = 20, Invalid account = 21, User unknown = 22, Reason unknown = 23, Unknown payment gateway response = 24, No response from payment gateway = 25, Exceeded retry limit = 26, Illegal client request = 27, Expired = 28

property.name: adapterTransactionStatus
property.description: Payment gateway adapter application state for the transaction to update

property.name: startDateGreaterThanOrEqual
property.description: Filter transactions later than specific date

property.name: endDateLessThanOrEqual
property.description: Filter transactions earlier than specific date

class.name: KalturaHouseholdWithHolder
class.description: Holder object for Household With enum

action.name: add
action.description: Add a new future scheduled system announcement push notification

param.name: announcement
param.description: The announcement to be added. timezone parameter should be taken from the 'name of timezone' from: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms912391(v=winembedded.11).aspx Recipients values: All, LoggedIn, Guests

action.name: delete
action.description: Delete an existing announcing. Announcement cannot be delete while being sent.

action.name: enableSystemAnnouncements
action.description: Enable system announcements

action.name: list
action.description: Lists all announcements in the system.

action.name: update
action.description: Update an existing future system announcement push notification. Announcement can only be updated only before sending

param.name: announcement
param.description: The announcement to update. timezone parameter should be taken from the 'name of timezone' from: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms912391(v=winembedded.11).aspx Recipients values: All, LoggedIn, Guests

action.name: updateStatus
action.description: Update a system announcement status

action.name: add
action.description: Add new application authentication token

action.name: delete
action.description: Delete application authentication token by id

action.name: get
action.description: Get application authentication token by id

action.name: startSession
action.description: Starts a new KS (Kaltura Session) based on application authentication token id

param.name: tokenHash
param.description: hashed token - current KS concatenated with the application token hashed using the application token ‘hashType’

param.name: userId
param.description: session user id, will be ignored if a different user id already defined on the application token

param.name: type
param.description: session type, will be ignored if a different session type already defined on the application token

param.name: expiry
param.description: session expiry (in seconds), could be overwritten by shorter expiry of the application token and the session-expiry that defined on the application token

action.name: add
action.description: Add asset comments by asset id

action.name: list
action.description: Returns asset comments by asset id

action.name: get
action.description: Returns media or EPG asset by media / EPG internal or external identifier

action.name: list
action.description: Returns media or EPG assets. Filters by media identifiers or by EPG internal or external identifier.

action.name: getContext
action.description: get KalturaAssetFileContext

action.name: list
action.description: Get recently watched media for user, ordered by recently watched first.

param.name: filter
param.description: Filter parameters for filtering out the result

param.name: pager
param.description: Page size and index. Number of assets to return per page. Possible range 5 ≤ size ≥ 50. If omitted - will be set to 25. If a value > 50 provided – will set to 50

action.name: query
action.description: Returns statistics for given list of assets by type and / or time period

action.name: add
action.description: Report player position and action for the user on the watched asset. Player position is used to later allow resume watching.

action.name: list
action.description: Returns player position record/s for the requested asset and the requesting user. If default user makes the request – player position records are provided for all of the users in the household. If non-default user makes the request - player position records are provided for the requesting user and the default user of the household.

param.name: filter
param.description: Filter option for the last position

action.name: delete
action.description: Delete CDN adapter by CDN adapter id

action.name: generateSharedSecret
action.description: Generate CDN adapter shared secret

action.name: list
action.description: Returns all CDN adapters for partner

action.name: update
action.description: Update CDN adapter details

action.name: get
action.description: Retrieve the partner’s CDN settings (default adapters)

action.name: update
action.description: Configure the partner’s CDN settings (default adapters)

action.name: add
action.description: Insert new C-DVR adapter for partner

action.name: delete
action.description: Delete C-DVR adapter by C-DVR adapter id

action.name: generateSharedSecret
action.description: Generate C-DVR adapter shared secret

action.name: list
action.description: Returns all C-DVR adapters for partner

action.name: add
action.description: Insert new channel for partner. Currently supports only KSQL channel

action.name: delete
action.description: Delete channel by its channel id

action.name: get
action.description: Returns channel info

action.name: update
action.description: Update channel details. Currently supports only KSQL channel

action.name: get
action.description: Returns information about a coupon

action.name: cancel
action.description: Immediately cancel a subscription, PPV or collection. Cancel is possible only if within cancellation window and content not already consumed

param.name: transactionType
param.description: The transaction type for the cancelation

action.name: cancelRenewal
action.description: Cancel a household service subscription at the next renewal. The subscription stays valid till the next renewal.

action.name: externalReconcile
action.description: Reconcile the user household's entitlements with an external entitlements source. This request is frequency protected to avoid too frequent calls per household.

action.name: forceCancel
action.description: Immediately cancel a subscription, PPV or collection. Cancel applies regardless of cancellation window and content consumption status

param.name: transactionType
param.description: The transaction type for the cancelation

action.name: grant
action.description: Grant household for an entitlement for a PPV or Subscription.

param.name: productId
param.description: Identifier for the product package from which this content is offered

param.name: productType
param.description: Product package type. Possible values: PPV, Subscription, Collection

param.name: history
param.description: Controls if the new entitlements grant will appear in the user’s history. True – will add a history entry. False (or if ommited) – no history entry will be added

param.name: contentId
param.description: Identifier for the content. Relevant only if Product type = PPV

action.name: list
action.description: Gets all the entitled media items for a household

action.name: add
action.description: Adds a new bulk export task

action.name: delete

param.description: The identifier of the task to delete

action.description: Gets an existing bulk export task by task identifier

param.name: id
param.description: The identifier of the task to get

action.name: list
action.description: Returns bulk export tasks by tasks identifiers

action.name: update
action.description: Updates an existing bulk export task by task identifier

action.description: Add a user's tv series follow. Possible status codes: UserAlreadyFollowing = 8013, NotFound = 500007, InvalidAssetId = 4024

action.name: delete
action.description: Delete a user's tv series follow. Possible status codes: UserNotFollowing = 8012, NotFound = 500007, InvalidAssetId = 4024, AnnouncementNotFound = 8006

action.name: list
action.description: List user's tv series follows. Possible status codes:

action.name: add
action.description: Add a new home network to a household

action.name: delete
action.description: Delete household’s existing home network

action.description: Retrieve the household’s home networks

action.name: update
action.description: Update and existing home network for a household

action.name: add
action.description: Creates a household for the user

action.name: delete
action.description: Fully delete a household. Delete all of the household information, including users, devices, transactions and assets.

action.name: get
action.description: Returns the household model

action.name: resetFrequency
action.description: Reset a household’s time limitation for removing user or device

param.name: frequencyType
param.description: Possible values: devices – reset the device change frequency. users – reset the user add/remove frequency

action.name: resume
action.description: Resumed a given household service to its previous service settings

action.name: suspend
action.description: Suspend a given household service. Sets the household status to “suspended".The household service settings are maintained for later resume

action.name: update
action.description: Update the household name and description

action.name: add
action.description: Registers a device to a household using pin code

action.name: addByPin
action.description: Registers a device to a household using pin code

action.name: delete
action.description: Removes a device from household

action.name: generatePin
action.description: Generates device pin to use when adding a device to household by pin

action.name: get
action.description: Returns device registration status to the supplied household

action.name: update
action.description: Update the name of the device by UDID

action.name: updateStatus
action.description: Update the name of the device by UDID

action.name: get
action.description: Get the limitation module by id

action.name: delete
action.description: Disable payment-gateway on the household

action.name: set
action.description: Enable a payment-gateway provider for the household.

action.name: getChargeID
action.description: Get a household’s billing account identifier (charge ID) for a given payment gateway

param.name: paymentGatewayExternalId
param.description: External identifier for the payment gateway

action.name: invoke
action.description: Gets the Payment Gateway Configuration for the payment gateway identifier given

param.name: paymentGatewayId
param.description: The payemnt gateway for which to return the registration URL/s for the household. If omitted – return the regisration URL for the household for the default payment gateway

param.name: intent
param.description: Represent the client’s intent for working with the payment gateway. Intent options to be coordinated with the applicable payment gateway adapter.

param.name: extraParameters
param.description: Additional parameters to send to the payment gateway adapter.

action.name: list
action.description: Get a list of all configured Payment Gateways providers available for the account. For each payment is provided with the household associated payment methods.

action.name: setChargeID
action.description: Set user billing account identifier (charge ID), for a specific household and a specific payment gateway

param.name: paymentGatewayExternalId
param.description: External identifier for the payment gateway

param.name: chargeId
param.description: The billing user account identifier for this household at the given payment gateway

action.name: forceRemove
action.description: Force remove of a payment method of the household.

action.name: list
action.description: Get a list of all configured Payment Gateways providers available for the account. For each payment is provided with the household associated payment methods.

action.name: remove
action.description: Removes a payment method of the household.

action.name: setAsDefault
action.description: Set a payment method as default for the household.

action.name: list
action.description: Returns all the premium services allowed for the household

action.name: get
action.description: Returns the household's quota data

action.description: Adds a user to household

action.name: delete
action.description: Removes a user from household

param.name: userId
param.description: The identifier of the user to delete

action.name: list
action.description: List inbox messages

action.name: get
action.description: Get the URL for playing an asset - EPG or media (not available for recording for now).

action.name: get
action.description: Retrieve a message template used in push notifications and inbox

action.name: update
action.description: Set the account’s push notifications and inbox messages templates

param.name: assetType
param.description: The asset type to update its template

param.name: template
param.description: The actual message with placeholders to be presented to the user

param.name: identifier
param.description: In case type is "announcement", identifier should be the announcement ID. In case type is "system", identifier should be "login" (the login topic)

action.name: setDevicePushToken

param.name: username
param.description: Username of the user to activate

action.name: addRole
action.description: Edit user details.

action.name: anonymousLogin
action.description: Returns tokens (KS and refresh token) for anonymous access

action.name: delete
action.description: Permanently delete a user. User to delete cannot be an exclusive household master, and cannot be default user.

action.name: get
action.description: Retrieving users' data

action.name: getEncryptedUserId
action.description: Resend the activation token to a user

action.name: list
action.description: Retrieve user by external identifier or username

action.description: User sign-in via a time-expired sign-in PIN.

param.name: secret
param.description: Additional security parameter to validate the login

action.name: logout
action.description: Logout the calling user.

action.name: refreshSession
action.description: Returns new Kaltura session (ks) for the user, using the supplied refresh_token (only if it's valid and not expired)

action.name: register
action.description: Sign up a new user.

action.name: resendActivationToken
action.description: Resend the activation token to a user

param.name: username
param.description: Username of the user to activate

action.name: resetPassword
action.description: Send an e-mail with URL to enable the user to set new password.

action.name: setInitialPassword
action.description: Renew the user's password after validating the token that sent as part of URL in e-mail.

action.name: update
action.description: Given a user name and existing password, change to a new password.

param.name: user
param.description: UserData Object (include basic and dynamic data)

action.name: updateLoginData
action.description: Given a user name and existing password, change to a new password.

action.name: disable
action.description: Disables a parental rule that was previously defined by the household master. Disable can be at specific user or household level.

action.name: disableDefault
action.description: Disables a parental rule that was defined at account level. Disable can be at specific user or household level.

action.name: enable
action.description: Enable a parental rules for a user

action.name: list
action.description: Return the parental rules that applies for the user or household. Can include rules that have been associated in account, household, or user level. Association level is also specified in the response.

action.name: update
action.description: Update Partner Configuration

action.name: delete

param.name: alias

param.name: intent
param.description: Represent the client’s intent for working with the payment gateway. Intent options to be coordinated with the applicable payment gateway adapter.

param.name: extraParameters
param.description: Additional parameters to send to the payment gateway adapter.

action.name: add
action.description: Issue a record request for a program

action.name: cancel
action.description: Cancel a previously requested recording. Cancel recording can be called for recording in status Scheduled or Recording Only

action.name: delete
action.description: Delete one or more user recording(s). Delete recording can be called only for recordings in status Recorded

action.name: get
action.description: Returns recording object by internal identifier

action.name: list
action.description: Return a list of recordings for the household with optional filter by status and KSQL.

param.name: filter
param.description: Filter parameters for filtering out the result

action.name: protect
action.description: Protects an existing recording from the cleanup process for the defined protection period

action.name: list
action.description: Returns all regions for the partner

action.name: list
action.description: Retrieve the registry settings.

action.name: add
action.description: Issue a record request for a complete season or series

action.name: cancel
action.description: Cancel a previously requested series recording. Cancel series recording can be called for recording in status Scheduled or Recording Only

action.name: cancelByEpgId
action.description: Cancel EPG recording that was recorded as part of series

action.name: cancelBySeasonNumber
action.description: Cancel Season recording epgs that was recorded as part of series

action.name: delete
action.description: Delete series recording(s). Delete series recording can be called recordings in any status

action.name: deleteBySeasonNumber
action.description: Delete Season recording epgs that was recorded as part of series

action.name: list
action.description: Return a list of series recordings for the household with optional filter by status and KSQL.

param.name: filter
param.description: Filter parameters for filtering out the result - support order by only - START_DATE_ASC, START_DATE_DESC, ID_ASC,ID_DESC,SERIES_ID_ASC, SERIES_ID_DESC

action.name: get
action.description: Parses KS

param.name: session
param.description: Additional KS to parse, if not passed the user's KS will be parsed

action.description: Switching the user in the session by generating a new session for a new user within the same household

param.name: userIdToSwitch
param.description: The identifier of the user to change

action.description: Return the user object with social information according to a provided external social token

action.description: Return the user object with social information according to a provided external social token

action.name: login
action.description: Login using social token

action.name: merge
action.description: Connect an existing user in the system to an external social network user

action.name: register
action.description: Create a new user in the system using a provided external social token

action.name: unmerge
action.description: Disconnect an existing user in the system from its external social network user

action.name: list
action.description: Returns a list of subscriptions requested by Subscription ID or file ID

action.description: Returns country details by the provided IP, if not provided - by the client IP

action.name: getVersion
action.description: Returns current server version

action.description: Retrieve the purchase session identifier

action.name: purchase
action.description: Purchase specific product or subscription for a household. Upon successful charge entitlements to use the requested product or subscription are granted.

action.name: setWaiver
action.description: This method shall set the waiver flag on the user entitlement table and the waiver date field to the current date.

action.name: updateStatus
action.description: Updates a pending purchase transaction state.

param.name: signature
param.description: Security signature to validate the caller is a payment gateway adapter application

action.name: validateReceipt
action.description: Verifies PPV/Subscription/Collection client purchase (such as InApp) and entitles the user.

action.description: Retrieve all the rules (parental, geo, device or user-type) that applies for this user and asset.

param.description: Asset list type to delete from

action.name: add
action.description: Generate a time and usage expiry login-PIN that can allow a single login per PIN. If an active login-PIN already exists. Calling this API again for same user will add another login-PIN

param.name: secret
param.description: Additional security parameter for optional enhanced security

action.name: delete
action.description: Immediately expire all active login-PINs for a user

action.name: deleteAll
action.description: Immediately expire all active login-PINs for a user

action.name: update
action.description: Set a time and usage expiry login-PIN that can allow a single login per PIN. If an active login-PIN already exists. Calling this API again for same user will add another login-PIN

param.name: secret
param.description: Additional security parameter to validate the login

action.name: list
action.description: Retrieving user roles by identifiers, if filter is empty, returns all partner roles
